name: Stellar Empires
description:
Welcome to the Stellar Empires, a strategy game where you take control of an Empire, lead it to complete domination by colonizing new planets! The goal of the game is simple - the player has an initial planet and he has to control the armies to capture the enemy planets.

Features:

  • Online multiplayer up to 4 players.
  • Ability to play against AI.
  • Availability of 20 challenges.
  • Massive Short-Session Battles.
  • Tree abilities.
  • Availability of an automatically generated map.
  • Simple and clear gameplay.
